      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void SetupGUI.initialiseGame​(int gameDuration, java.lang.String farmerName, int farmerAge, java.lang.String farmName, Farm selectedFarm)
      Initialises all the variables used by the game with their values in the setup screen.
      void Store.printFarmerAssets​(Farm farm)
      Prints assets the player has to the system console, in a very very rudimentary fashion.
      boolean Store.purchaseAnimal​(Farm farm, java.lang.String animalName)
      Purchases an animal: checks if player has enough money, then deducts money and adds animal to farm.
      boolean Store.purchaseCrop​(Farm farm, java.lang.String cropName)
      Purchases a crop: checks if player has enough money, then deducts money and adds crop to farm.
      boolean Store.purchaseItem​(Farm farm, java.lang.String itemName)  
      void Store.visitStore​(Farm farm, java.util.Scanner sc)
      Runs game loop for interacting with store.
      Constructors in main with parameters of type Farm 
      Constructor Description
      Farmer​(Farm myFarm)
      Initialises Farmer using an existing farm.
      Farmer​(Farm myFarm, java.lang.String myName, int myAge)
      Initialises Farmer using an existing farm, in addition to a name and an age for the farmer.
